title: Fight the Tide
description: Adrift in chaos, they only have each other.The world as Adam and Parker knew it burns. With the zombie-like infected rampaging through the ruins, the only escape is the open sea. Then they hear a message over the airwaves from an island offering refuge.While Parker is dead set against it, orphaned wolf Adam can’t resist the call of the pack he’s always wanted.Is Salvation Island their safe harbor—or a trap?Fight the Tide is a steamy gay romance from Keira Andrews featuring found family, werewolves, the zombie apocalypse, and of course a happy ending (eventually).
author: Keira Andrews
